shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Nägärä Maryam “The Story of Mary” (fols. 5ra-130ra) I-1) Reading for St. Anne´s Conception of Mary, the Nativity of Mary, Mary´s entry into the temple (fols. 5ra-17rb) I-2) Reading for the 21st of Gǝnbot (fols. 17rb-36va) I-3) Reading for the 21st of Säne (fols. 36va-42rb) I-4) Reading for the 21st of Ḥamle (fols. 42rb-47rb) I-5) Reading for the 7th of Näḥase (fols. 47va-51vb) I-6) Reading for the 21st of Mäskäräm (fols. 51vb-53ra) I-7) Reading for the 21st of Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 53ra-54vb) I-8) Reading for the 21st of Ḫǝdar (fols. 54vb-61vb) I-9) Reading for the 21st of Taḥśaś (fols. 62ra-66vb) I-10) Reading for the 21st of Ṭǝrr (fols. 66vb-73vb) I-11) Reading for the 16th of Yäkkatit (fols. 73vb-79rb) I-12) Reading for the 21st of Yäkkatit (fols. 79rb-83vb) I-13) Reading for the 21st of Mäggabit (fols. 84ra-90vb) I-14) Reading for the 21st of Miyazya (fols. 91ra-99rb) I-15) Reading added to every month (fols. 99rb-130ra)
Additiones 1-2; colophon.

copyists.copyist: Gäbrä Śǝllase is mentioned as the scribe in the supplication formulas on fols. 111vb, 129vb.

donors.donor: Additio 2 mentions Wälättä Täklä Haymanot as the donor. According to Additio 1 she is also the commissioner of the book. Her name and the names of her relatives are also mentioned in the supplication formulas (e.g., fols. 5ra, 42rb, 62ra, 90vb, 106ra), s. Varia.

dcomments.dcomment: According to the colophon, the Ms. was completed on the 13th of Ṭǝrr 1933 year of mercy, year of Matthew (= 8 January 1941).

txstates.txstate: The leather cover is slightly damaged along the corners. Some fols. are slightly stained with water (e.g., fols. 102, 107). Fols. 49, 99, 108, 125 have been enlarged by sewing a piece of parchment onto them. Tears amended on fols. 47, 63, 82, 88.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: single line fillet, double circle, criss cross, double crescent, x-form, double sine wave with dots).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of the endband stitches at the spine cover.

inks.ink: Black, strong red, vivid fuchsia (e.g. fols. 44v, 119v-124r, 129r-130r).

squires.squire: A(4/fols. 1r-4v) – I(8/fols. 5r-12v) – II(8/fols. 13r-20v) – III(8/fols. 21r-28v) – IV(8/fols. 29r-36v) – V(8/fols. 37r-44v) – VI(8/fols. 45r-52v) – VII(8/fols. 53r-60v) – VIII(8/fols. 61r-68v) – IX(8; s.l.: 3,stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 69r-76v) – X(8/fols. 77r-84v) – XI(8/fols. 85r-92v) – XII(8/fols. 93r-100v) – XIII(8/fols. 101r-108v) – XIV(8/fols. 109r-116v) – XV(8/fols. 117r-124v) – XVI(6/fols. 125r-130v) – B(4/fols. 131r-134v).

taunit.rl-info:
Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling (below the ruling in fols. 5v-7r). The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Some leaves have one additional bottom ruled line not used by the scribe (fols. 6r, 6v, 11r, 11v).

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra, name of the commissioner; the word Gigar in Text I-2. Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-9, I-13, I-14, alternating with black lines; incipit of each reading and each subsections in Texts I-2 and I-15; a few lines on fols. 11ra, 42vb, 45ra, 61ra-b, 66va; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ ዓሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ fol. 66vb ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ fol. 36va ለዓለ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ fol. 53ra ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ fol. 17rb ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ fol. 51vb ለይኩ፡ for ለይኩን፡ fol. 54vb ለ፡ for ለይኩን፡ fol. 83vb

colophon.det: The colophon states that the Ms. was completed on the 13th of Ṭǝrr 1933 year of mercy, year of Matthew (= 8 January 1941).

additional.cont: Fol. 130ra-b: Note on commissioning the writing.
additional.det: The note is written in blue ink possibly in the main hand. It states that Wälättä Täklä Haymanot commissioned the book and mentions her father Wäldä ʾAnanya, her mother Wälättä Mikaʾel, her son, her daughters and her grandchildren.

additional.cont: Fol. 130rb: Donation note.
additional.det: The note is written in blue ink possibly in the main hand, and states that Wälättä Täklä Haymanot donated the book to the church of (Wälwalo Däbrä Bǝrhan) Qirqos.

extras.extra: - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally in black ink: e.g., fols. 8ra, 15rb, 27rb, 43vb, 83ra, 100va. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally in vivid fuchsia: fols. 17va, 37ra. - Omitted letter inserted interlineally in blue pen: fol. 71vb. - Omitted letters or words added at the end of the line in black ink: fols. 11rb, 92rb. - Omitted letter added at the beginning of the line in vivid fuchsia ink: fol. 76ra. - Erasure: fol. 18rb. - One bottom line erased on fol. 11ra. - Corrections over erasure in black ink: e.g., fols. 8vb, 23va, 61ra, 78vb, 104ra. - Corrections over erasure in vivid fuchsia ink: fols. 19ra, 19rb, 22va. - Names of many individuals are inserted in the supplication formulas: Wälättä Täklä Haymanot (in vivid-fuchsia ink: e.g., fols. 5ra, 42rb, 67ra, 73vb, 99rb, interlineally in blue ink: e.g., fols. 36va, 73vb, 83vb), her father Wäldä ʾAnanya (in vivid-fuchsia ink: e.g., fols. 42rb, 53ra, 66vb, 84ra, 112ra, interlineally in blue ink: fol. 99rb), Wälättä Mikaʾel (interlineally in blue ink: e.g., fols. 17rb, 47rb, 54vb, 90vb, 102ra), Wälättä Krǝstos (in vivid-fuchsia ink: fols. 36va, 78rb, interlineally in blue ink: e.g., fols. 51vb, 62ra, 73vb, 90vb, 99rb), Wälättä ʾIyäsus (in vivid-fuchsia ink: fols. 51vb, 83vb, interlineally in blue ink: e.g., fols. 42rb, 54vb, 67ra, 90vb), Wälättä Maryam (in vivid-fuchsia ink: fol. 54vb, interlineally in blue ink: e.g., fols. 36va, 62ra, 78rb, 106ra), Täsfa Śǝllase (in vivid-fuchsia ink: fols. 36va, 99rb, interlineally in blue ink: e.g., fols. 47rb, 53ra, 66vb, 112ra), ʿAmätä Maryam (in vivid-fuchsia ink: fols. 47rb, 99rb), Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer (interlineally in blue ink: e.g., fols. 66vb, 99rb). - Pen trials on fols. 104v,134r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by dates written in coloured decorated frames in the upper margin: ዘፅንሰታ፡ ወዘልደታ፡ ወዘበዓታ፡ ምንባብ። fol. 5r በአታ፡ fol. 7ra (crudely written in blue pen) ዘልደቱ፡ ዘአማኑኤል፡ fol. 12va (crudely written in blue pen) አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለግንቦት፡ fol. 17rb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለሰኔ፡ fol. 36va ዘሐምሌ፡ fol. 42rb ዘነሐሴ፡ fol. 47va ዘመስከረም፡ fol. 51vb ዘጥቅምት፡ fol. 53ra ዘኅዳር፡ fol. 54vb ዘታኅሣሥ፡ fol. 62r ዘጥር፡ fol. 66vb አመ፡ ፲ወ፮ለየካቲት፡ fol. 73vb አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለየካቲት፡ fol. 78rb ዘመጋቢት፡ ዘመጋቢት። fol. 84r አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለሚያዝያ፡ fol. 91r ድሙር፡ ዘ፲ወ፪አውራኅ፡ fol. 102ra (in blue ink) ዘጥር፡ fol. 108v (in blue ink) ዘዘወትር፡ fol. 111ra (in blue ink) አመ፡ ፵ሁለየካቲት፡ (sic) fol. 112r (in blue pen).

frames.frame: - Fol. 5r (incipit page of Text I-1): coloured (red, green, strong amber, black) ornamental band; interlaces, floral and geometrical motifs. - Fol. 62r (incipit page of Text I-9): coloured (red, dark turquoise, vivid amber, outlined in black) ornamental band; interlaces; floral motifs. - Fol. 84r (incipit page of Text I-13): coloured (crimson, dark turquoise, vivid gold, outlined in black) ornamental band; interlaces; floral motifs. - Fol. 91r (incipit page of Text I-14): coloured (crimson, dark turquoise, vivid gold, outlined in black) ornamental band; interlaces; floral motifs. - Fol. 108v: coloured (crimson, deep cyran, strong gold, outlined in black) ornamental band; interlaces; floral motifs.
